Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
The 1st year I did some dedication managing my 2 notary nodes. Did fine, not too much, go auto-reelected and elected somehow.
2nd year I did not manage my nodes myself entirely and left it to @ns408 and the automation.
focused on other programming stuff and learning, with as much less responsibilities I can have over my head.
did poor, I'm out of notary nodes, and don't wish to be a notary node now.
Being a Notary Node operator is a constant pressure to manage it. It is really like a 24/7 job.
much much much dedicated job than your normal 8-5 job.
